imaGroupNumber.name: imaGroupNumber
imaGroupNumber.description: The number of IMA groups configured on this system.

imaGroupEntry.name: imaGroupEntry
imaGroupEntry.description: An entry in the IMA Group table.

imaGroupIndex.name: imaGroupIndex
imaGroupIndex.description: A unique value for the IMA Group.

imaGroupRowStatus.name: imaGroupRowStatus
imaGroupRowStatus.description: This object identifies the IMA Group's administrative status. It is used to enable and disable a group.

imaGroupIfIndex.name: imaGroupIfIndex
imaGroupIfIndex.description: This object identifies the logical interface number ('ifIndex') assigned to this IMA group, and is used to identify corresponding rows in the Interfaces MIB. Note that re-initialization of the management agent may cause a client's 'imaGroupIfIndex' to change.

imaGroupNeState.name: imaGroupNeState
imaGroupNeState.description: The current operational state of the near-end IMA Group State Machine.

imaGroupFeState.name: imaGroupFeState
imaGroupFeState.description: The current operational state of the far-end IMA Group State Machine.

imaGroupFailureStatus.name: imaGroupFailureStatus
imaGroupFailureStatus.description: The current failure status of the IMA group (the reason why the GTSM is in the down state.

imaGroupMinNumTxLinks.name: imaGroupMinNumTxLinks
imaGroupMinNumTxLinks.description: Minimum number of transmit links required to be Active for the IMA group to be in the Up state.

imaGroupMinNumRxLinks.name: imaGroupMinNumRxLinks
imaGroupMinNumRxLinks.description: Minimum number of receive links required to be Active for the IMA group to be in the Up state.

imaGroupNeTxClkMode.name: imaGroupNeTxClkMode
imaGroupNeTxClkMode.description: Transmit clocking mode used by the near-end IMA group.

imaGroupFeTxClkMode.name: imaGroupFeTxClkMode
imaGroupFeTxClkMode.description: Transmit clocking mode used by the far-end IMA group.

imaGroupTxTimingRefLink.name: imaGroupTxTimingRefLink
imaGroupTxTimingRefLink.description: The ifIndex of the transmit timing reference link to be used by the near-end for IMA data cell clock recovery from the ATM layer.

imaGroupRxTimingRefLink.name: imaGroupRxTimingRefLink
imaGroupRxTimingRefLink.description: The ifIndex of the receive timing reference link to be used by near-end for IMA data cell clock recovery toward the ATM layer.

imaGroupLastChange.name: imaGroupLastChange
imaGroupLastChange.description: The time-of-day the IMA group last changed operational state (i.e., value of imaNeGroupState changed).

imaGroupTxImaId.name: imaGroupTxImaId
imaGroupTxImaId.description: The IMA ID currently in use by the near-end IMA function.

imaGroupRxImaId.name: imaGroupRxImaId
imaGroupRxImaId.description: The IMA ID currently in use by the far-end IMA function.

imaGroupTxFrameLength.name: imaGroupTxFrameLength
imaGroupTxFrameLength.description: The frame length to be used by the IMA group in the transmit direction. Can only be set when the IMA group is startup.

imaGroupRxFrameLength.name: imaGroupRxFrameLength
imaGroupRxFrameLength.description: Value of IMA frame length as received from remote IMA function.

imaGroupDiffDelayMax.name: imaGroupDiffDelayMax
imaGroupDiffDelayMax.description: The maximum number of milliseconds of delay differential among the links that will be tolerated on this interface.

imaGroupLeastDelayLink.name: imaGroupLeastDelayLink
imaGroupLeastDelayLink.description: The ifIndex of the link configured in the IMA group which has the smallest link propagation delay. This value has meaning only if at least 1 link has been configured in the IMA group.

imaGroupDiffDelayMaxObs.name: imaGroupDiffDelayMaxObs
imaGroupDiffDelayMaxObs.description: The latest maximum differential delay observed (in milliseconds), i.e. between the links having the least and most link propagation delay, among the receive links that are currently configured in the IMA group.

imaGroupAlphaValue.name: imaGroupAlphaValue
imaGroupAlphaValue.description: This indicates the 'alpha' value used to specify the number of consecutive invalid ICP cells to be detected before moving to the IMA HUNT state.

imaGroupBetaValue.name: imaGroupBetaValue
imaGroupBetaValue.description: This indicates the 'beta' value used to specify the number of consecutive errored ICP cells to be detected before moving to the IMA HUNT state.

imaGroupGammaValue.name: imaGroupGammaValue
imaGroupGammaValue.description: This indicates the 'gamma' value used to specify the number of consecutive valid ICP cells to be detected before moving to the IMA SYNC state from the PRESYNC state.

imaGroupRunningSecs.name: imaGroupRunningSecs
imaGroupRunningSecs.description: The amount of time (in seconds) since this IMA group has been in operation (up or down).

imaGroupUnavailSecs.name: imaGroupUnavailSecs
imaGroupUnavailSecs.description: Count of one second intervals where the IMA Group Traffic State Machine is Down.

imaGroupNeNumFailures.name: imaGroupNeNumFailures
imaGroupNeNumFailures.description: The number of times a near-end group failure (Config-Abort, Insufficient-Links) has been reported since power-up or reboot.

imaGroupFeNumFailures.name: imaGroupFeNumFailures
imaGroupFeNumFailures.description: The number of times a far-end group failure (Config-Abort-FE, Insufficient-Links-FE, Blocked-FE) has been reported since power-up or reboot. This is an optional attribute.

imaGroupTxAvailCellRate.name: imaGroupTxAvailCellRate
imaGroupTxAvailCellRate.description: The current cell rate (truncated value in cells per second) provided by this IMA group in the transmit direction, considering all the transmit links in the Active state.

imaGroupRxAvailCellRate.name: imaGroupRxAvailCellRate
imaGroupRxAvailCellRate.description: The current cell rate (truncated value in cells per second) provided by this IMA group in the receive direction, considering all the receive links in the Active state.

imaGroupNumTxCfgLnks.name: imaGroupNumTxCfgLnks
imaGroupNumTxCfgLnks.description: The number of links that are configured to transmit in this IMA group.

imaGroupNumRxCfgLnks.name: imaGroupNumRxCfgLnks
imaGroupNumRxCfgLnks.description: The number of links that are configured to receive in this IMA group.

imaGroupNumTxActLnks.name: imaGroupNumTxActLnks
imaGroupNumTxActLnks.description: The number of links which are configured to transmit and are currently Active in this IMA group.

imaGroupNumRxActLnks.name: imaGroupNumRxActLnks
imaGroupNumRxActLnks.description: The number of links which are configured to receive and are currently Active in this IMA group.

imaGroupTestLinkIfIndex.name: imaGroupTestLinkIfIndex
imaGroupTestLinkIfIndex.description: This object is used to designate an interface as the Test Link. A value of -1 specifies that the implementation may choose the Test Link. In this case, the implementation may also choose the value of 'imaGroupTestPattern'.

imaGroupTestPattern.name: imaGroupTestPattern
imaGroupTestPattern.description: The value of this object is used to specify the test pattern in an IMA group loopback operation. A value in the range 0 to 255 designates a specific pattern. A value of -1 specifies that the implementation may choose the value. In this case, the implementation may also choose the value of 'imaGroupTestLinkIfIndex'.

imaGroupTestProcStatus.name: imaGroupTestProcStatus
imaGroupTestProcStatus.description: This object is used to enable or disable the Test Pattern Procedure, and to note whether at least one link failed the test. The test is started by setting operating(2) status. If any link should fail the test, the IMA will set the status to linkfail(3). The linkfail(3) state will persist until either the disabled(1) state is set or until no instance of imaLinkTestProcStatus has the value linkfail(3). Only the values disabled(1) and operating(2) may be written. Writing the operating(2) value will not cause clearing of the linkfail(3) state.

imaLinkTable.name: imaLinkTable
imaLinkTable.description: The IMA group Link Status and Configuration table.

imaLinkEntry.name: imaLinkEntry
imaLinkEntry.description: An entry in the IMA Group Link table.

imaLinkIfIndex.name: imaLinkIfIndex
imaLinkIfIndex.description: This corresponds to the 'ifIndex' of the MIB-II interface on which this link is established. This object also corresponds to the logical number ('ifIndex') assigned to this IMA link.

imaLinkRowStatus.name: imaLinkRowStatus
imaLinkRowStatus.description: The imaLinkRowStatus object allows create, change and delete operations on imaLinkTable entries. To create a new conceptual row (or instance) of the imaLinkTable, imaLinkRowStatus must be set to 'createAndWait' or 'createAndGo.' A successful set of the object imaLinkGroupIndex must be performed before the RowStatus of this new row can transition to the 'Active' state. The imaLinkGroupIndex provides the association between a physical IMA link to an IMA group. To change (modify) an imaLinkTable entry, the imaLinkRowStatus object must be set to 'notInService'. Only then can the conceptual row be changed. Setting object imaLinkGroupIndex to a different value has the effect of changing the association between a physical IMA link and an IMA group. To place the link 'in group', the imaLinkRowStatus object is set to 'Active'. While the row is not in 'Active' state, both the Transmit and Receive IMA state machines are in the 'Not In Group' state. To remove (delete) an imaLinkTable entry from this table, set this object to 'destroy.' A network manager may elect to perform a delete operation followed immediately by a create operation instead of a modify operation. The net effect of the delete/create is to re-instantiate (reset) agent counters defined in this table.

imaLinkGroupIndex.name: imaLinkGroupIndex
imaLinkGroupIndex.description: The value which identifies the IMA group (imaGroupIndex) of which this link is a member.

imaLinkNeTxState.name: imaLinkNeTxState
imaLinkNeTxState.description: The current state of the near-end transmit link.

imaLinkNeRxState.name: imaLinkNeRxState
imaLinkNeRxState.description: The current state of the near-end receive link.

imaLinkFeTxState.name: imaLinkFeTxState
imaLinkFeTxState.description: The current state of the far-end transmit link as reported via ICP cells.

imaLinkFeRxState.name: imaLinkFeRxState
imaLinkFeRxState.description: The current state of the far-end receive link as reported via ICP cells.

imaLinkNeRxFailureStatus.name: imaLinkNeRxFailureStatus
imaLinkNeRxFailureStatus.description: The current link failure status of the near-end receive link.

imaLinkFeRxFailureStatus.name: imaLinkFeRxFailureStatus
imaLinkFeRxFailureStatus.description: The current link failure status of the far-end receive link as reported via ICP cells.

imaLinkTxLid.name: imaLinkTxLid
imaLinkTxLid.description: The outgoing LID used currently on the link by the local end. This value has meaning only if the link belongs to an IMA group.

imaLinkRxLid.name: imaLinkRxLid
imaLinkRxLid.description: The incoming LID used currently on the link by the remote end as reported via ICP cells. This value has meaning only if the link belongs to an IMA group.

imaLinkRelDelay.name: imaLinkRelDelay
imaLinkRelDelay.description: The latest measured delay on this link relative to the link, in the same IMA group, with the least delay.

imaLinkImaViolations.name: imaLinkImaViolations
imaLinkImaViolations.description: ICP violations: count of errored, invalid or missing ICP cells during non-SES-IMA condition.

imaLinkOifAnomalies.name: imaLinkOifAnomalies
imaLinkOifAnomalies.description: The number of OIF anomalies during non-SES-IMA condition at the near-end. This is an optional attribute.

imaLinkNeSevErroredSec.name: imaLinkNeSevErroredSec
imaLinkNeSevErroredSec.description: Count of one second intervals containing several IV-IMA, or one or more link defects (e.g., LOS, OOF/LOF, AIS, LCD), LIF, LODS defects during non-UAS-IMA condition.

imaLinkFeSevErroredSec.name: imaLinkFeSevErroredSec
imaLinkFeSevErroredSec.description: Count of one second intervals containing one or more RDI-IMA defects.

imaLinkNeUnavailSec.name: imaLinkNeUnavailSec
imaLinkNeUnavailSec.description: Count of unavailable seconds at near-end: unavailability begins at the onset of 10 contiguous SES-IMA and ends at the onset of 10 contiguous seconds with no SES-IMA.

imaLinkFeUnavailSec.name: imaLinkFeUnavailSec
imaLinkFeUnavailSec.description: Count of unavailable seconds at far-end: unavailability begins at the onset of 10 contiguous SES-IMA-FE and ends at the onset of 10 contiguous seconds with no SES-IMA-FE.

imaLinkNeTxUnusableSec.name: imaLinkNeTxUnusableSec
imaLinkNeTxUnusableSec.description: Tx Unusable seconds: count of Unusable seconds at the near end Tx LSM.

imaLinkNeRxUnusableSec.name: imaLinkNeRxUnusableSec
imaLinkNeRxUnusableSec.description: Rx Unusable seconds: count of Unusable seconds at the near end Rx LSM.

imaLinkFeTxUnusableSec.name: imaLinkFeTxUnusableSec
imaLinkFeTxUnusableSec.description: Tx Unusable seconds at far-end: count of seconds with Unusable indications from the far-end Tx LSM.

imaLinkFeRxUnusableSec.name: imaLinkFeRxUnusableSec
imaLinkFeRxUnusableSec.description: Rx Unusable seconds at far-end: count of seconds with Unusable indications from the far-end Rx LSM.

imaLinkNeTxNumFailures.name: imaLinkNeTxNumFailures
imaLinkNeTxNumFailures.description: The number of times a near-end transmit failure alarm condition has been entered on this link.

imaLinkNeRxNumFailures.name: imaLinkNeRxNumFailures
imaLinkNeRxNumFailures.description: The number of times a near-end receive failure alarm condition has been entered on this link (i.e., LIF, LODS, Mis-Connected, RDI-IMA).

imaLinkFeTxNumFailures.name: imaLinkFeTxNumFailures
imaLinkFeTxNumFailures.description: The number of times a far-end transmit failure alarm condition has been entered on this link. This is an optional attribute.

imaLinkFeRxNumFailures.name: imaLinkFeRxNumFailures
imaLinkFeRxNumFailures.description: The number of times a far-end receive failure alarm condition has been entered on this link (i.e., LIF, LODS, Mis-Connected, RDI-IMA). This is an optional attribute.

imaLinkTxStuffs.name: imaLinkTxStuffs
imaLinkTxStuffs.description: Counts of stuff events inserted in the transmit direction. This is an optional attribute.

imaLinkRxStuffs.name: imaLinkRxStuffs
imaLinkRxStuffs.description: Counts of stuff events detected in the receive direction. This is an optional attribute.

imaLinkRxTestPattern.name: imaLinkRxTestPattern
imaLinkRxTestPattern.description: This object identifies the test pattern received in the ICP Cell (octet 17) on the link during the IMA Test Pattern Procedure. This value then may be compared to the transmitted test pattern.

imaLinkTestProcStatus.name: imaLinkTestProcStatus
imaLinkTestProcStatus.description: This value indicates the current state of the Test Pattern Procedure. If the value is disabled(1), the test is not running. A value of operating(2) means the test is running and no error has been found on this interface. A value of linkfail(3) means an error has been detected o this link during the test. Once an error occurs, the linkfail(3) value is latched until either this object is read or until the imaGroupTestProcStatus is moved to disabled(1). Once read, if the error no longer persists, a subsequent read will report the value operating(2).

imaLinkNumber.name: imaLinkNumber
imaLinkNumber.description: This corresponds to the link number on the IMA Group.

imaDs1Table.name: imaDs1Table
imaDs1Table.description: A table of physical layer configuration for the DS1 interface

imaDs1Entry.name: imaDs1Entry
imaDs1Entry.description: A entry in the table, containing information about the physical layer of a DS1 interface

imaDs1ConfLoopback.name: imaDs1ConfLoopback
imaDs1ConfLoopback.description: This object is used to modify the state of internal loopback....

imaDs1ConfTxTimingRefLink.name: imaDs1ConfTxTimingRefLink
imaDs1ConfTxTimingRefLink.description: The ifIndex of the transmit timing reference link to be used by the near-end for IMA data cell clock recovery from the ATM layer.

imaDs1ConfScramble.name: imaDs1ConfScramble
imaDs1ConfScramble.description: The cells are scrambled / de-scrambled on the line.

imaDs1StatsYelAlarmCount.name: imaDs1StatsYelAlarmCount
imaDs1StatsYelAlarmCount.description: A count of the number of Yellow Alarms.

imaDs1StatsMOSErrors.name: imaDs1StatsMOSErrors
imaDs1StatsMOSErrors.description: Multiframe out of sync error counter.

imaDs1StatsConSevErrSec.name: imaDs1StatsConSevErrSec
imaDs1StatsConSevErrSec.description: Count of Consecutive Severely Errored Seconds.

imaDs1StatsSevErrFramSec.name: imaDs1StatsSevErrFramSec
imaDs1StatsSevErrFramSec.description: Count of Severely Errored Framing Seconds.

imaDs1StatsClearCounters.name: imaDs1StatsClearCounters
imaDs1StatsClearCounters.description: Clear all counters in this group ONLY.

imaDs1DebugAddr.name: imaDs1DebugAddr
imaDs1DebugAddr.description: PCI Phy address for DS1 port register.

imaDs1DebugReadValue.name: imaDs1DebugReadValue
imaDs1DebugReadValue.description: Value read from DS1 port register.

imaDs1DebugWriteValue.name: imaDs1DebugWriteValue
imaDs1DebugWriteValue.description: Value written to DS1 port register.

imaDs1DebugRead.name: imaDs1DebugRead
imaDs1DebugRead.description: Read or Write of DS1 port register (TRUE = READ).

imaDs1PortNumber.name: imaDs1PortNumber
imaDs1PortNumber.description: The port number on the IMA.

imaE1Table.name: imaE1Table
imaE1Table.description: A table of physical layer configuration for the E1 interface

imaE1Entry.name: imaE1Entry
imaE1Entry.description: A entry in the table, containing information about the physical layer of a E1 interface

imaE1ConfLoopback.name: imaE1ConfLoopback
imaE1ConfLoopback.description: This object is used to modify the state of internal loopback....

imaE1ConfTxTimingRefLink.name: imaE1ConfTxTimingRefLink
imaE1ConfTxTimingRefLink.description: The ifIndex of the transmit timing reference link to be used by the near-end for IMA data cell clock recovery from the ATM layer.

imaE1ConfScramble.name: imaE1ConfScramble
imaE1ConfScramble.description: The cells are scrambled / de-scrambled on the line.

imaE1StatsConSevErrSec.name: imaE1StatsConSevErrSec
imaE1StatsConSevErrSec.description: Count of Consecutive Severely Errored Seconds.

imaE1StatsSevErrFramSec.name: imaE1StatsSevErrFramSec
imaE1StatsSevErrFramSec.description: Count of Severely Errored Framing Seconds.

imaE1StatsClearCounters.name: imaE1StatsClearCounters
imaE1StatsClearCounters.description: Clear all counters in this group ONLY.

imaE1DebugAddr.name: imaE1DebugAddr
imaE1DebugAddr.description: PCI Phy address for E1 port register.

imaE1DebugReadValue.name: imaE1DebugReadValue
imaE1DebugReadValue.description: Value read from E1 port register.

imaE1DebugWriteValue.name: imaE1DebugWriteValue
imaE1DebugWriteValue.description: Value written to E1 port register.

imaE1DebugRead.name: imaE1DebugRead
imaE1DebugRead.description: Read or Write of E1 port register (TRUE = READ).

imaE1PortNumber.name: imaE1PortNumber
imaE1PortNumber.description: The port number on the IMA.
